name: Party Must Go On
description:
Hi, my name´s Particia and I am your virtual assistant for home parties. Let´s get the party started!

Made in less than 48 hours during Ludum Dare 46 game jam in April 2020.

Team

Art: Iveta Doležalová https://www.instagram.com/iveta.dole/ 

Models: Quinten Buijs http://quintendesign.eu/ 

Code: Jaroslav Meloun http://jarnik.com/

Get ready to keep the party alive and going on and on and on….

Play as the latest invention in home entertainment: Particia and ensure that your party keeps on alive by refilling drinks & snacks, caffeinate your guest’s to keep them going,  keep people talking when they have nothing to talk about and keep pumping up the music. 

Fail in your tasks for too long and the party will start to shut down, which is against your directives.

How to Play:
Keep an eye on the requests of the guests, which can be conversational starters or coffee.
Keep a watch on the snacks, drinks and music by: dispensing chip bags to the snack bowl, 
bottles to the punch bowl and Lp’s to the Lp Player when indicated. 
The overall party mood is tracked with a green bar at the top of the screen, fulfill everyone needs quickly to pump up the mood, take to long to make it go down. Once the bar reaches 0, the party is over. 

Controls:
- Mouse to aim 
- LMB to dispense party
- Number key 1-5: Select party items
- Scroll wheel up/down: Select Party items
